LanguageData.AM_EjectHemogenDesc: Ejects all the hemogen packs stored inside the mech's storage vats
LanguageData.AM_MustNotBePlacedCloseToAnother: Band nodes, beamcaster and voidlink band nodes must not be placed close to each other
LanguageData.AM_Tier2BandAmount: Bandwidth amount for Beamcaster Band Nodes
LanguageData.AM_Tier2BandAmountDesc: Each Beamcaster Band Node will increase a pawn's bandwidth by this amount. Only applies if you have Biotech DLC active. Electric power in the nodes will need to be toggled before the changes take effect.
LanguageData.AM_Tier3BandAmount: Bandwidth amount for Voidlink Band Nodes
LanguageData.AM_Tier3BandAmountDesc: Each Voidlink Band Node will increase a pawn's bandwidth by this amount. Only applies if you have Biotech DLC active. Electric power in the nodes will need to be toggled before the changes take effect.
